titleStmt.title: The liberty of the imprisoned Royalist.
titleStmt.author: Lovelace, Richard, 1618-1658.

notesStmt.note: Includes two other poems: "Vpon his Majesties coming to Holmby" and "A panegyrick faithfully representing the proceedings of the Parliament at Westminster, ..".
Trimmed at foot, affecting Thomason annotation.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
